description: h tr cc hc sinh lp 12 ang n thi vo i hc, chng mnh xin c gii thiu mt ng dng, n mang tn l m ngc ngy thi  Chc nng chnh ca ng dng ny l m ngc thi gian cho n ngy thi quan trng nht trong 12 nm cp sch n trng K THI TRUNG HC PH THNG QUC GIA Nhng khng n thun l m ngy, bn mnh cn b sung cho n nhng tnh nng sau y  + Kho ti liu hc tp phong ph chng mnh ang xy dng v lun c cp nht lin tc gm  cc mn Ton, L, Ha, Sinh,... + Chc nng ghi ch gip ghi li k hoch cng nh cc vic cn lm trong tng lai  trnh b qun, phc v cho vic hc tp nh ghi li lch i hc thm ny, ghi ch hc hnh... + Tin ch hin s ngy cn li  mn hnh chnh v km theo 1 cu ni to ng lc na, gip cho cc bn cm thy c ng lc khi n thi. (y l cch a n ra: https://www.facebook.com/DemNguocNgayThiApp/posts/286363932060948) + Bn s nhn c thng bo cp nht t cc AD khi c ti liu mi, thng tin mi v k thi, nhng li chc, nhc nh hng ngy,..v.v...  Giao din n gin, cch iu v d s dng, mong l mi ngi hy ti v v s dng nh 1 cng c tr gip cho k thi sp ti. Hi vng ng dng ny s gip cc bn hc tp tt hn, cho 1 k thi tht thnh cng. To support the 12th graders who are studying for college, we would like to introduce an application, which is called Counting down the test day.  The main function of this app is to count down the time until the most important exam date in 12 years of schooling to STATE OF THE NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL EXAM But not simply counting days, we also added it with the following features  + The rich learning materials we are building are always updated continuously, including Math, Physics, Chemistry, Biology, ... + Notes function helps to record the plan as well as to-do in the future to avoid forgetting, serving for learning such as recording this extra study schedule, learning notes ... + The utility displays the remaining days at the main screen and includes a motivational statement, which helps you feel motivated when exam preparation. (This is how to bring it out: https://www.facebook.com/DemNguocNgayThiApp/posts/286363932060948) + You will receive an update from AD when you have new documents, new information about the exam, daily greetings, reminders, etc.  The interface is simple, stylized and easy to use, so please download and use it as a tool to help with the upcoming exam. Hopefully this application will help you study better, give a successful exam.
